de.lambeck.pned.models.gui

Class GuiModelController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lambeck.pned.models.gui.GuiModelController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInfo_DrawingAreaSize, IInfo_MousePos, IInfo_SelectionRangeSize, IInfo_Status, IGuiModelController

    public class GuiModelController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGuiModelController
    Observes the state of the GUI.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ApplicationController appController
      Reference to the ApplicationController
      private IDrawPanel currentDrawPanel
      Current draw panel is the draw panel that corresponds to the active tab of the tabbed pane.
      private IGuiModel currentModel
      Current model is the model that corresponds to the active tab of the tabbed pane.
      private static boolean debug
      Show debug messages?
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,IDrawPanel> drawPanels
      List of draw panels identified by their name (full name of the file)
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,IGuiModel> guiModels
      List of GUI models identified by their name (full name of the file)
      protected I18NManager i18n
      The manager for localized strings
      private static int MIN_SHAPE_SIZE
      Minimum shape size for setter
      private java.util.List<IGuiNode> movedNodes
      A list of nodes which have been moved during a mouse drag operation and need an update in the data model after dragging has finished.
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,javax.swing.AbstractAction> popupActions
      The Map with possible AbstractAction in popup menus
      private ENodeType sourceForNewArcType
      The type of the source node for the new Arc to be added.
      private IGuiNode sourceNodeForNewArc
      The source node for the new Arc to be added.
      private boolean stateAddingNewArc
      Stores if this GUI model controller is in the state of "adding a new Arc" to the current GUI model.

      Constructs a GUI model controller with references to the application controller (the parent) and a manager for localized strings.

        private IGuiNode sourceNodeForNewArc
        The source node for the new Arc to be added.

        Note: The local attribute "addingNewArc" should be true if this attribute is != null.

      • sourceForNewArcType

        private ENodeType sourceForNewArcType
        The type of the source node for the new Arc to be added.

      • stateAddingNewArc

        private boolean stateAddingNewArc
        Stores if this GUI model controller is in the state of "adding a new Arc" to the current GUI model. Which means that he is waiting for the second (target) node.

      • addGuiModel

        public void addGuiModel(java.lang.String modelName,
                        java.lang.String displayName)
        Description copied from interface: IGuiModelController
        Adds a GUI model for a non-existing file.

        Note: This is intended to be used to add new models which are not coming from a PNML file (e.g. "Untitled1", "Untitled2"... or "New1", "New2"...)
        Specified by:
        addGuiModel in interface IGuiModelController
        Parameters:
        modelName - The full path name of the PNML file
        displayName - The title of the tab (= the file name)

                          java.lang.String displayName)
        Called by addGuiModel to add an associated IDrawPanel.
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)
        displayName - The title of the tab (= the file name)

        Description copied from interface: IGuiModelController
        Resets the "modified" state of the specified model.

        Note: Use this method after loading a PNML file because the model has not been changed by the user after adding elements from the PNML file only.
        Specified by:
        resetModifiedGuiModel in interface IGuiModelController
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)

      • addPlaceToCurrentGuiModel

        public void addPlaceToCurrentGuiModel(java.lang.String id,
                                      java.lang.String name,
                                      EPlaceToken initialTokens,
                                      java.awt.Point position)
        Description copied from interface: IGuiModelController
        Adds a place to the current GUI model.

        Intended use: adding a place after reading from a PNML file because these places may have a name.
        Specified by:
        addPlaceToCurrentGuiModel in interface IGuiModelController
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the place
        name - The name of the place
        initialTokens - The initial tokens count of the place
        position - The position (center) of the place

      • addTransitionToCurrentGuiModel

        public void addTransitionToCurrentGuiModel(java.lang.String id,
                                           java.lang.String name,
                                           java.awt.Point position)
        Description copied from interface: IGuiModelController
        Adds a transition to the current GUI model.

        Intended use: adding a transition after reading from a PNML file because these transitions may have a name.
        Specified by:
        addTransitionToCurrentGuiModel in interface IGuiModelController
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the transition
        name - The name of the transition
        position - The position (center) of the transition

      • addArcToCurrentGuiModel

        public void addArcToCurrentGuiModel(java.lang.String id,
                                    java.lang.String sourceId,
                                    java.lang.String targetId)
        Description copied from interface: IGuiModelController
        Adds an arc to the current GUI model.

        Note: This method should be the same for GUI events and reading from a PNML file because arcs will have all 3 attributes in either cases.
        Specified by:
        addArcToCurrentGuiModel in interface IGuiModelController
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arc
        sourceId - The id of the source (Place or Transition)
        targetId - The id of the target (Place or Transition)

      • getGuiModelForValidation

        private IGuiModel getGuiModelForValidation(java.lang.String modelName)
        Returns the specified IGuiModel with suppressed error messages if not found because this error can be expected in rare cases.

        This method is part of the validation process. And the validation controller thread might slightly lagging behind in terms of the current model (e.g. if the user has suddenly closed the current file during validation).
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)
        Returns:
        The specified IGuiModel if found; otherwise null
